application.name: specpix
application.brief: Replace user specified pixels with Isis special pixel values
application.description: This program will replace the user specified pixels to Isis special pixel values. Overlap between the ranges of differing special pixel values is not allowed. Each special pixel range must be unique. If the min and max for a given range is the same, then only that exact DN will be converted. Consequently, all ranges are fully inclusive for their minimums and maximums.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the input filename. All bands within the file will be checked for replacement of pixels.

parameter.description: This file will contain the cube with specified pixels replaced with Isis special pixel values.
